title: Going to start recording
body: Hey all, im just starting to record games and test out editing, I have a friend who currently already does so, I have a decent sized group of mates who are on pretty often but looking for more players who are interested in joining in for when we need spots to be filled(not to say you would just be some side hoe friend) no real requirements just dont be toxic, pref discord, dont have to be super social, just not a sad sack of potatoes that doesnt enjoy trying anything, dont be afraid to hit me up randos! :)

replies.body:
Well good on you :D

Quite a few here will try to shut you down, but if you have a drive to do this, then go for it :D

Just be sure that you aren't doing it for the money because 1) you will fold pretty soon, and 2) YouTube is messed up nowadays, so earning and getting noticed is harder than ever.

Best of luck, though <3

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
thanks dude, and yeah i know they reduced ad revenue and getting noticed would be difficult, its more just the trying to start community events tbh ^-^
ill report you if you try and ks me mate
you cant tell me what to do, ill take all the kills!
